author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Place the mango halves onto a baking sheet. Drizzle them with the honey, then sprinkle the chilli and cinnamon over them. Bake for 3-4 minutes, or until the coating is just bubbling.  To serve, place the baked mango halves onto a serving plate, and spoon the whipped cream alongside.
